R

removeManagerFromTheTeam(Manager, boolean) - Method in class valerioFarriciello.Controller.League
Checks if the manager is in the team already, if it is the case the database object will be called
and it will remove the manager from the team.
The reason why this is an option is that we don't always want to refresh the database immediately, since
this method will be called anyway right after a new assignment, therefore it will be a waste of time
refreshing the database twice after a few milliseconds
removeManagerFromTheTeam(String) - Method in class valerioFarriciello.Model.Database
Sets the value managerID in the Team table to null.
removePlayerFromTheTeam(Player, boolean) - Method in class valerioFarriciello.Controller.League
Removes the player from the team.
It first will find the assignmentID in order to be passed into the database object.
removePlayerFromTheTeam(int) - Method in class valerioFarriciello.Model.Database
Removes an instance of PlayersAssignment from the database
RemoveTab - Class in valerioFarriciello.View
Class responsible to get the values for removing players and managers from a team
RemoveTab(League) - Constructor for class valerioFarriciello.View.RemoveTab
Generates a gridpane that contains 1 single button for the user to select a team.
